reviewText: I loved watching the movie. In the beginning I had a small problem with sound, so instead of watching the DVD on a regular DVD player, I watched it on X-box player. It's a very interesting movie, I liked it! Evgeniy Leonov, who played the main hero Oreshnikov (the photographer) - is one of the greatest actors of Soviet era. He played in famous movies, like "Gentlemen of Fortune", "Mimino"(small episode) or "Kind-Dza-Dza", etc. This movie is good to watch with the family. Too pity, there's no English subtitles, only Russian soundtrack.
